rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports actions factually ('will be depopulated', 'depopulation is complete') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment uses containment verbs ('depopulated') which are Neutral per rules.
The segment reports depopulation but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes 'birds on the properties will be depopulated to prevent the spread' and 'depopulation is complete', response measures.
